content.description: Learn the basics of Java, one of the most popular programming languages.

lessons.title: Variables
lessons.explanation: Variables serve as containers for storing and managing data, making them a fundamental concept to grasp before delving deeper into Java development.

lessons.title: Primitive Types
lessons.explanation: Data types define the kind of values a variable can hold and are essential knowledge for anyone starting their journey in Java development.

test.description: Evaluate your fundamental knowledge of the Java programming language.

questions.content: What is a variable in Java?
answers: A method that performs a specific task.
A data structure used for storing multiple values.
A reserved word used to define a constant value.
A named container for storing data that can change during program execution.

questions.content: Which primitive data type in Java can contain whole numbers?
